planning: Book dining reservations 60 days in advance
Allow time for travel between parks
scheduling: Arrive at park opening for shorter wait times
Plan popular attractions during less busy times
Leave some flexibility for spontaneous fun
efficiency: Group activities by location in the park
Use mobile ordering for quick service
Check wait times before heading to attractions
Consider park hopper tickets for multiple parks
